/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
